37.sentence: Nazi Germany was years--no, decades--ahead of its time. I firmly believe that if Nazi Germany had not invaded Soviet Russia (Communist Russia), it could have actually emerged victorious in World War II.

38.sentence: Despite being massively outnumbered, the Third Reich and the German Army made such a valiant effort to defeat the Communist Russians, that they were within the shadows of Stalingrad. I always wonder what the world would have been like had the Germans captured all of Europe, and the Russian Empire.
